Em Cmaj7 I drank too much last night D Got bills to pay G D/F# Em Cmaj7 My head just feels in pain I missed the bus D and there'll be hell today G D/F# Em Cmaj7 I'm late for work again And even if I'm there D G D/F# They'll all imply that I might not last the day Em Cmaj7 And then you call me Em And it's not so bad Cmaj7 It's not so bad
